DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess safety, to measure blood levels of drug, and to find out what the drug does to the body.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of BMS-986171 in Healthy People to Assess Safety, to Measure Blood Levels of Drug, and to Find Out What the Drug Does to the Body
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Age 21 to 55 years (Part A,B, and C) BMI 3040 (Part A or Part B); BMI 2035 (Part C). BMI = weight (kg)/ [height (m)] Any significant medical illness Cannot tolerate subcutaneous injections, or having blood samples taken Smoking more than 10 cigarettes/day History of allergy to pegylated compounds or of hypersensitivity to protein based therapeutics. HIV, Hepatitis B virus (HBV) or Hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection. Pregnancy
